data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{8-x^{3}}{x^{2}-4}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of  x  compute (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 2} \frac{8-x^{3}}{x^{2}-4} $

data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{x^3 - 8}{x - 2}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of x (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 2} \frac{x^3 - 8}{x - 2}$

data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{x^2 - 4}{x - 2}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of x (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 2} \frac{x^2 - 4}{x - 2}$

data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{1 - x^2}{1 - x}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of x (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 1} \frac{1 - x^2}{1 - x}$

data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{x^2 - 9}{x - 3}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of x (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 3} \frac{x^2 - 9}{x - 3}$

data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{x^2 - 1}{x - 1}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of x (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 1} \frac{x^2 - 1}{x - 1}$

data.body: For the function $f(x) = \frac{2x^2 - 8}{x - 2}$ answer each of the following questions.
data.prompt: (a) Evaluate the function at the following values of x (accurate to at least 8 decimal places).
data.followUpPrompt: (b) Use the information from (a) to estimate the value of $\lim_{x \to 2} \frac{2x^2 - 8}{x - 2}$

data.body: To the right is the graph of $f(x)$. For each of the given points determine the value of $f(a)$ and $\lim_{x \to a} f(x)$.
data.prompt: If any of the quantities do not exist clearly explain why.
